channel.title: Could someone plz help me change my pk shop. (read more plz)
channel.description: hey i wanted to change my shop's pk points needed to buy a item in the shop. could someone explain to me please how to do this and which folder should i goto my client folder or source? please someone help me.

item.title: Could someone plz help me change my pk shop. (read more plz)
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

Go to your source’s itemconfig (317 delta)
Search for the item
the first 3 numbers are prices (if you don’t know specifics i’d change them all to the pk point price)
save
compile
HOORAY

Read full topic
item.source: Could someone plz help me change my pk shop. (read more plz)

item.title: Could someone plz help me change my pk shop. (read more plz)
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

joelx617:

hey i wanted to change my shop’s pk points needed to buy a item in the shop. could someone explain to me please how to do this and which folder should i goto my client folder or source? please someone help me.

This is PI

You go to your server folder. Here is how.

Server folder -> src -> server -> model -> shops

In their you well find ShopAssistant.java

Search for public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

Under it you well see things such as this

case 6916: case 6918: case 6920: case 6922: case 6924: return 50; case 11663: case 11664: case 11665: case 8842: return 30;

The case = item id of the item you want make special price for.

The return = the ammount of points you want it to be worth.

I hope this helps you.

Read full topic
